attributes.action: Remove from our land, Islamic extreamists and all those connected with Al-Queada
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For too long, we the people of this land called Britain, have lived under the threat of being Islamified under Sharia law! This must stop immediately, and all those who support Al-Queada, and any other terrorist organistations must be forcefully removed from our country!

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
